channel.title: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]
channel.description:
Trying to do slayer, and its boring and slow EXP. Still, people told me its faster. But from i've been experiencing its slower. This is my setup.... Any suggestions pLEASE help me :(
[img]http://gyazo.com/73d2cb041b494cfe621166f8b084c1ba.png[/img]

item.title: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Your not cannoning kalphites, no wonder it was a bad xp task for you.

You cannon anything and everything.
It doesn’t look like your praying, always use prayers… Pot regularly. Use momentum for slayer. Use better gear (personal preference to how you play, their isn’t a set best type but their are best types for certain situations obv so don’t ask whats good).
Use an aggressive familiar.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]

item.title: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Shove on momentum and sit back.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]

item.title: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

eyeownyew:

I’m still used to the old armor look… But it looks like a slayer helmet [which was totally nerfed D:], fighter torso, and barrorws legs [likely torag’s]. I’d recommend swapping the fighter torso out if that’s what it is, because they aren’t too great anymore. You’ll have to search for replacement helms yourself, I’m not sure which is the best anymore [yes, slayer helms even suck for slayer now :(]

Full torags black mask cause it was slayer task.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I maximize my EXP [Eoc]
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:4, topic:470548”]Change your equipment, too. A lot of items had their stats changed, your armor is actually pretty bad.

Umm, use Momentum when doing slayer. Pretty useful.[/quote]

You say my armor is bad, the least you could do is tell me what to replace it with
